subject: Deaths (Obituaries)
Basketball
lead_paragraph: A 6-foot-8 forerunner of the power forward in today’s game, Schayes was the first N.B.A. player to score 15,000 points, a 12-time All-Star and a league champion with the 1955 Syracuse Nationals.
snippet: A 6-foot-8 forerunner of the power forward in today’s game, Schayes was the first N.B.A. player to score 15,000 points, a 12-time All-Star and a league champion with the 1955 Syracuse Nationals.
